Sentence.sentence: Saying that there're no easy answers sounds wise, but it's actually foolish: our unemployment crisis could be cured very quickly if we had the intellectual clarity and political will to act.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: No one knows how to make that happen quickly.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: If employees respond quickly to their job assignments, the employer is likely to demand more from them.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Cigarette sales have been falling far more quickly than in the UK.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: So I quickly designed a skirt on my computer, and I loaded the file on the printer.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: If the Thames were lapping around Big Ben, Londoners would face up to the problem of emissions pretty quickly.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: minister of social security, quickly commissioned a study to determine the causes of and possible cures for this disturbing stale of affairs.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Milkman, the sociologist, argues that American craftsmanship isn't disappearing as quickly as some would argue - that it has instead shifted to immigrants.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: million jobs lost in the last three months, there is urgent desire to boost the economy as quickly as possible
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Experts on leadership will quickly point out that "how things get done" influences the success of the outcomes and indicates a right way and a wrong way to do things.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: His Seven Habits of Highly Effective People became a popular bestseller very quickly
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: There is no easy way to measure racism directly; instead psychologists assess what is known as "implicit bias", using a computer-based test that measures how quickly people associate positive and negative words—such as "love" or "evil"—with photos of black or white faces.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A similar test can also measure how quickly subjects associate stereotypical traits—such as athletic skills or mental ability—with a particular group
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Both strains quickly invaded local hospitals when needle sharing and other unhealthy practices ensured the rapid spreading of the infection by bringing people into contact with contaminated body fluids.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Ebola was so deadly and killed so quickly that within a short period of time, there was no one around to infect
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The old stereotypes of men's and women's work have been changing more quickly than ever before, except perhaps in my own marriage.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: In general, photo-centric websites like Flickr were found to be better at quickly removing deleted photos upon request.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: "What our study suggests is that teenagers learn more quickly and more effectively when their peers are present than when they're on their own,'' Steinberg says.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题(第二套)阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Because there was slightly more matter, the collisions quickly depleted all the anti-matter and left just enough matter to create stars, planets, and eventually us.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Craigslist quickly overtook newspaper classified ads and turned newspaper economics upside down.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: For many of my peers though, Venus quickly lost its romance.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: He quickly learned what the market has demonstrated: Demand for grass-fed products currently exceeds supply.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: I quickly passed over state schools and southern schools, believing their curriculums to be automatically inferior to northeastern or western counterparts.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: If it doesn't sound like too much of a cliché, our world is constantly changing and it's changing quickly.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: In the peak of the dot.com bubble, brick and mortar retail was one of those industries the internet was going to kill—and quickly.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: It reproduces incredibly quickly, breeding up to 12 generations per year if conditions are favorable.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: It seems to be a law in the technology industry that leading companies eventually lose their positions, often quickly and brutally .
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Publishers were interested only in books that would sell fairly quickly in sufficient numbers to cover the costs of production and make a profit.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Some internet-driven changes have happened quickly, of course.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: We can't really lose heat by breathing quickly and loudly like dogs.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: We've only been working together the last six months, but we quickly became good friends.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: After less than a week, I started noticing that the groceries were running out pretty quickly — we were always suddenly out of something.

Sentence.sentence: But it can quickly rise to something worse, when everyone starts hitting "reply all" to join in a long and unpleasant conversation.

Sentence.sentence: Here are a few tips to help you win over everyone in the neighborhood quickly.

Sentence.sentence: However, instead of devoting themselves to their work, they find themselves working to support the lifestyle to which they have so quickly become accustomed.

sentence.en: The city was crowded with disappointed people with no interest in settling down,  and when they heard there were new gold discoveries in Alaska,  they left Dawson city as quickly as they had come.

entry.def: Someone or something that is quick moves or does things with great speed.

example.ex: You'll have to be quick. The flight leaves in about three hours...
example.tran: 你得快点了，飞机大约3小时后起飞。

example.ex: I think I'm a reasonably quick learner...
example.tran: 我认为我是一个学东西还算快的人。

entry.def: Quicker is sometimes used to mean 'at a greater speed', and quickest to mean 'at the greatest speed'. Quick is sometimes used to mean 'with great speed'. Some people consider this to be non-standard.
entry.tran: (quicker 有时表示“以更快的速度”，quickest表示“以最快的速度”，quick有时表示“以很快的速度”，但有些人认为这种用法并不规范)

example.ex: Warm the sugar slightly first to make it dissolve quicker...
example.tran: 先将糖稍稍加热，以使其溶解得更快些。

entry.def: Something that is quick takes or lasts only a short time.
entry.tran: 短暂的;持续时间很短的

example.ex: He took one last quick look about the room...
example.tran: 他朝房间匆匆扫了最后一眼。

example.ex: I just popped in for a quick drink...
example.tran: 我只是顺路过来小酌一杯。

entry.def: Quick means happening without delay or with very little delay.
entry.tran: 立刻发生的;很快发生的

example.ex: Officials played down any hope for a quick end to the bloodshed...
example.tran: 官员们让迅速结束这场流血冲突的希望变得渺茫起来。

example.ex: These investors feel the need to make quick profits.
example.tran: 这些投资者觉得收益必须立竿见影。

entry.def: Quick is sometimes used to mean 'with very little delay'.
entry.tran: 迅速发生地;很快发生地

example.ex: I got away as quick as I could...
Quick! John! It's Carmela. I think she's taken an overdose...
example.tran: 快来！约翰！卡梅拉出事了，我想她用药过量了。

entry.def: If you are quick to do something, you do not hesitate to do it.

example.ex: Mark says the ideas are Katie's own, and is quick to praise her talent...
example.tran: 马克说这些都是凯蒂自己的想法，并随即称赞起她的天赋来。

example.ex: Furthermore, as Gervaise was quick to point out, Mr Scully was not a detective.
example.tran: 而且，正如热尔韦斯毫不犹豫地指出来的那样，斯库利先生并不是一名侦探。

entry.def: If someone has a quick temper, they are easily made angry.
entry.tran: 性情急躁的;容易发怒的

entry.def: If someone bites their nails to the quick, they bite off all the white part at the end of each nail.
entry.tran: 咬到了指甲肉；咬秃指甲

example.ex: Her fingernails are bitten to the quick.
example.tran: 她的手指甲都被咬秃了。

entry.def: If something cuts you to the quick, it makes you feel very upset.
entry.tran: 触及（…）痛处;极大伤害；令…伤透了心

example.ex: I once heard her weeping in her bedroom, which cut me to the quick.
example.tran: 有一次，我听见她在卧室里哭泣，这深深地刺痛了我的心。

sentences.cn: 有一次，我听见她在卧室里哭泣，这深深地刺痛了我的心。
sentences.en: I once heard her weeping in her bedroom, which cut me to the quick.

sentences.cn: 不加防腐剂,肉会坏得快.
sentences.en: Meat spoils more quickly without preservatives.

sentences.cn: 尽管球星们还是令人印象深刻, 但替补阵容却才是最让我眼前一亮的.
sentences.en: As impressive as our stars were, the second unit impressed me the most.

sentences.cn: 一周很快过去了.
sentences.en: A week passed very quickly.

sentences.cn: 她的希望迅速破灭.
sentences.en: Her hopes were quickly snuffed out.

sentences.cn: 客人一到,他立刻笑脸相迎.
sentences.en: He quickly donned a welcoming smile as his guests arrived.

sentences.cn: 他是人能迅速变瘦的活见证.
sentences.en: He is walking proof that people can lose weight quickly.

sentences.cn: 医生迅速地用药麻醉了患者.
sentences.en: The doctor drugged his patient quickly.

sentences.cn: 那棵树迅速地立了起来,巨人惊恐地叫着, 在空中旋转着摔了出去.
sentences.en: The tree shot quickly upright the giant , yelling with terror, was whirled away through the air.

sentences.cn: 她迅速地把水罐里的水统统倒进水槽.
sentences.en: So she quickly emptied her jar into the trough.

sentences.cn: 从一方面来讲, 谷歌可以非常迅速地自愿销毁它收集的任何用户数据.
sentences.en: Set to one side, Google could voluntarily destroy very quickly any user data that it collects.

sentences.cn: 潘朵拉迅速地把盖子盖回去, 但太迟了.
sentences.en: Pandora quickly put the lid back on, but too late.

sentences.cn: 项目迅速地在3天内就谈成了.
sentences.en: Projects have been agreed upon in as quickly as 3 days.

sentences.cn: 在报告中,他们把信息迅速地随意地组合在一起.
sentences.en: They chunked the information quickly together in a report.

sentences.cn: 突然一股来自家庭生活的幸福感席遍我的全身,所有的烦恼也都迅速地消失了.
sentences.en: A fleeting sensation of domestic happiness passes over me and all my troubles vanish quickly.

sentences.cn: 督察迅速地环视了一下教室,检视着屋内的其他人.
sentences.en: The inspector glanced quickly around the room to check up on the others.
sentences.from: 英汉非文学 - 科学史

sentences.cn: 比尔迅速地刹住了车,避免了一起撞车事故.
sentences.en: Bill stopped the car quickly and prevented a crash.

sentences.cn: 激潮是海面下一种强大的暗流,从海岸迅速地流向大海.
sentences.en: Riptide is a strong underwater current. It moves quickly away from shore and out to sea.

sentences.cn: 我们如何比以前更容易更迅速地改变自己?
sentences.en: How can we produce change easily and quickly than ever before?

sentences.cn: 马先生迅速地打开门,并把灯打开.
sentences.en: Mr Ma the door quickly and turned on the light.

sentences.cn: 孩子们迅速地在操场上排好了队.
sentences.en: The children quickly lined up in the playground.

sentences.cn: 在正在活动的沉积作用区,沉积物迅速地将海底的有机物质掩埋起来而避免了遭受氧化作用.
sentences.en: Where organic material on the bottom is quickly covered by sediment and thus saved from oxidation.

sentences.cn: 割开的角膜复位以后, 就会迅速地附着在眼球上.
sentences.en: After the corneal flap is lowered backsintosplace, it quickly adheres to the eyeball.

sentences.cn: 司机迅速地刹了车,避免了一起事故.
sentences.en: The driver stopped the car quickly and prevented an accident.

sentences.cn: 他们都笑了, 就在这时思嘉迅速地环顾了下四周.
sentences.en: They all laughed and , as they did , Scarlett looked quickly about her.

sentences.cn: 这个饥饿的孩子迅速地吃完了饭.
sentences.en: The hungry boy quickly dispatched the meal.

sentences.cn: 潜艇能非常迅速地潜入水中.
sentences.en: The submarine can submerge very quickly.

sentences.cn: 他迅速地调转马头,跳进河里.
sentences.en: He turned his horse quickly and plunged into the stream.

sentences.cn: 我迅速地跳起来, 把我的双臂举过头顶, 接着开始欢呼.
sentences.en: I quickly jumped up, raised my arms over my head, and started cheering.

sentences.cn: 他接着又迅速地口授了他的个人遗嘱.
sentences.en: He then quickly dictated his personal will.

sentences.cn: 然而,为了更大地发挥这些不足取的优势, 亚拉杜瓦先生需要果断迅速地行动.
sentences.en: To make the most of these slim advantages, however, Mr Yar'Adua needs to act quickly.

sentences.cn: 当火灾发生时, 被困人员可以使用,达到平稳、安全、迅速地逃离危险现场.
sentences.en: When fire takes place, people can use tool to safely and quickly leave the site.

sentences.cn: 福罗拉开始迅速地爬上楼梯.
sentences.en: Flora quickly began climbing the stairs.

sentences.cn: 她迅速地走到电话机旁,给警察局打了电话.
sentences.en: Quickly she went the telephone and called the police.

sentences.cn: 收音机 、 电视机和报纸能迅速地把消息传达到全世界.
sentences.en: COMMUNICATE Radio, television, and newspapers quickly communicates news to all parts of the world.

sentences.cn: 当我迅速地涂上希瑟的答案时, 我跟自己说,就这一次.
sentences.en: It's just this one time, I told myself as I quickly scribbled Heather's answers.

sentences.cn: 我们迅速地互相打量了一下.
sentences.en: We exchanged glances, ie looked quickly at each other.

sentences.cn: 他立即答复了我的信。
sentences.en: He replied to my letter very quickly.

sentences.cn: 同盟需要立即建立并训练一只部队.
sentences.en: The Union needed to build and train an army quickly.

sentences.cn: 学生离开考场后, 立即凭记忆将这些问题记下来.
sentences.en: When the students left the examination room, they jotted down these questions quickly from memory.

sentences.cn: 当他得知对手是谁时,他立即断了想获取权力的念头.
sentences.en: His idea of winning power quickly toppled down when he learned who his opponent was.

sentences.cn: 访问者不能通过网站主页立即了解网站内容.
sentences.en: The home page does not quickly tell you what the Web site is all about.

sentences.cn: 我们得立即行动起来.
sentences.en: We have to act quickly.

sentences.cn: 然而, 如果我怀疑那儿的菜失去了自己的特色, 妈妈就会立即表示不同意.
sentences.en: However, if I anythat the food there had lost its way, my mother quickly disproved it.

sentences.cn: 那里的工作人员立即拿出碎布,在锅炉后面给小鹿铺了张床.
sentences.en: Maintenance men there quickly produced rags to make a bed behind the boiler for the fawn.

sentences.cn: 然而, 爱德华王子看见了这边的骚乱, 立即过来查看发生了什么事.
sentences.en: Edward saw the commotion, however, and quickly came to see what was happening.

sentences.cn: 人群立即散开了.
sentences.en: The crowd burst away very quickly.

sentences.cn: 她立即去开门, 而门却锁着, 于是她使劲地敲起来.
sentences.en: She quickly tried the door, but it was locked, so she started to pound on it.

sentences.cn: 俩人一拍即和, 立即行动.
sentences.en: The two fit in easily with each other, and quickly move to action.

sentences.cn: 胚细胞和糊粉层中的代谢活性立即活跃起来.
sentences.en: Metabolic activity quickly develops in the cells of the embryo and the aleurone layer.

sentences.cn: 他照做了, 但立即又冲了回去,上前耳语了最后一句珍重之辞.
sentences.en: He obeyed, but quickly darted forward again to whisper some final word.

sentences.cn: 他说了一些非常荒谬的话,我们立即给他指出来.
sentences.en: He said something very absurd and we took him up on it quickly.

sentences.cn: 伤兵被立即送上担架抬走.
sentences.en: Wounded soldiers were quickly ridden on stretchers.

sentences.cn: 人们立即聚集起来看斗鸡.
sentences.en: A crowd quickly assembled to watch the cockfight.

sentences.cn: 影星意外死亡后,恶意中伤的流言蜚语立即传开了.
sentences.en: Vicious gossip spread quickly among people after the film star's unexpected death.

sentences.cn: 乔立即离开.
sentences.en: Quickly Jo left the room.

sentences.cn: 只要我们获得批准,我们就立即转入获得样品和定单.
sentences.en: Once we have these approvals we will be moving quickly to acquire samples and place orders.

sentences.cn: 一旦有目标失败,立即退出(就象接收到一个中断).
sentences.en: Quit quickly as if an interrupt was received as soon as any target fails.

sentences.cn: 巨人蝙蝠向它的猎物俯冲而下并开始撕咬, 试图立即杀死它.
sentences.en: A giant bat swoops down on its prey and bites, attempting to kill it quickly.

sentences.cn: 我为里基茨感到遗憾,并立即加以解释.
sentences.en: Sorry for Richetts, I made my pitch as quickly as possible.

sentences.cn: 杰里立即叫大家穿上救生衣, 并且奋力灭火,但却无济于事.
sentences.en: Jerry quickly ordered everyone to put on life jackets, and to put out the fire.

sentences.cn: 挨耳光的水手立即拉开架势 -- 英国架势--要痛打艾布纳.
sentences.en: The slapped man quickly squared off, British fashion, to demolish Abner.

sentences.cn: 我打了他,他立即进行报复.
sentences.en: I hit him and he quickly countered.

sentences.cn: 瑞琪立即瞥了她丈夫一眼,同时, 伊丽莎用颤抖的声音回答一声 “ 是的 ”.
sentences.en: Rachel glanced quickly at her husband, as Eliza tremulously answered " yes ".

sentences.cn: 她从不吃后悔药, 而是立即采取补救措施.
sentences.en: She would not cry over split milk , but quickly set about mopping it up.

sentences.cn: 我会英语的口授笔记,同时能立即将其改写成中文.
sentences.en: I am able to get dictation in English and quickly transcribe into Chinese.

sentences.cn: 英军必须立即撤退.
sentences.en: The British forces had to retreat quickly.

sentences.cn: 这位男士马上点头表示同意。
sentences.en: This man quickly concurred

sentences.cn: 我马上把他们脱了下来,丢在副驾驶座位旁.
sentences.en: I quickly pulled them off and threw them into the passenger's seat.

sentences.cn: 当你下次犯了错误, 就要马上果断地行动起来.
sentences.en: Next time you make a mistake, act quickly and decisively.

sentences.cn: 如果她说小鸟是活的, 我就马上用劲一捏,让她看到那只死鸟.
sentences.en: If she says bird is alive, I'll quickly crush it and show her dead bird.

sentences.cn: 医生马上询问发生了什么事.
sentences.en: The doctor inquired quickly what had occurred.

sentences.cn: 他一眼看出情况不对,决定马上离开.
sentences.en: He took in what was happening and decided to get away quickly.

sentences.cn: 这辆卡车可以马上拆开用飞机运走.
sentences.en: The truck can be broken down quickly and transported by plane.

sentences.cn: 两位女孩和她们的父亲马上照做.
sentences.en: Both girls and their father quickly placed their napkins on their laps.

sentences.cn: 政府必须马上采取措施,以防更多的人在那条路上被车撞死.
sentences.en: The government must act quickly before more people are killed on that road.

sentences.cn: 你吸一口麻醉气体马上就会进入麻醉状态.
sentences.en: A whiff of gas will quickly put you off.

sentences.cn: 就跟炸开窝一样,三个人马上表明态度,反对这种观点.
sentences.en: Consternation erupted as the three quickly and forcefully dismissed the idea.

sentences.cn: 回到家, 马上为我的镜头举行开箱仪式.
sentences.en: After I reach home, I quickly held an Opening Ceremony for my new Lens.

sentences.cn: 美国的小朋友们马上会说, “ 圣诞老人 ”
sentences.en: American children will quickly say,'santa Claus! "

sentences.cn: 美国潜艇马上在那个岛上的登陆.
sentences.en: American marines quickly landed on the island.

sentences.cn: 一般来说, 一根宜用的球弦是有弹性的, 也就是说它能在球的冲击后马上的恢复(弹性)过来.
sentences.en: Generally, a playable string is resilient, which means It'snaps back quickly upon ball impact.

sentences.cn: 这时天黑了,因为在九月里,太阳一落,天马上就黑下来.
sentences.en: It was dark now as it becomes dark quickly after the sun sets in September.
sentences.from: 英汉文学 - 老人与海

sentences.cn: 他最终决定临危受命, 走马上任.
sentences.en: He finally decided to receive orders in the face of danger, and took office quickly.

sentences.cn: 马上就有一个村民跑回家然后拿来一些豆子给了那个陌生人.
sentences.en: Soon a villager ran home and quickly brought some beans and them to the stranger.

sentences.cn: 但波西亚坚称必须马上回去.
sentences.en: But Portia replied that she had to return quickly.

sentences.cn: 这番大话马上散播开来,很快就传到了地方法官的耳里.
sentences.en: This boasting quickly spread and soon reached the ears of the local judge.

sentences.cn: 好心肠的女主人听到一声大叫,马上赶过去.
sentences.en: On hearing a loud cry the kindhearted landlady quickly walked in.

sentences.cn: 现在是朝会时间. 请马上到朝会场地集合.
sentences.en: Now it's time for our Morning Assembly. Come to the Assembly area quickly, please.

sentences.cn: 她不能就这么窝回去, 心中乱也得马上有办法.
sentences.en: However upset she was, she must think of something and quickly too.

sentences.cn: 他马上建议总统公开发表一项谴责声明.
sentences.en: He quickly recommended that the President issue a public condemnation.

sentences.cn: 于是他送蟾蜍一些花种, 蟾蜍马上飞奔回家将它们种下.
sentences.en: When he gave Toad some flower seeds, Toad quickly ran home and planted them.

sentences.cn: 我们所面临的问题需要马上得到解决.
sentences.en: The problems which we are facing need to be solved quickly.

sentences.cn: 然后我马上向四周望去, 真见鬼,我是看见什么了?
sentences.en: I quickly looked around. What the hell was that I saw?

sentences.cn: 他一旦失掉那份好差事,就会马上神气不起来的.
sentences.en: When he loses that good job he will quickly come down off his high horse.

sentences.cn: 她会非常烦躁的想马上赢得你的注意力.
sentences.en: And she'll get VERY antsy to win your attention VERY quickly.

Sentence.sentence: However, as Amy Edmondson of Harvard points out, organisations increasingly use team as a verb rather than a noun: they form teams for specific purposes and then quickly disband them.

Sentence.sentence: At the same time, expenses in college pile up surprisingly quickly.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: But while printing quickly caused the hand written book to die out, handwriting lingered on (继续存在) well into the 16th century.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The ability to quickly thumb through pages is also lost
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Its own oil reserves are quickly running out.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The woman should order her food quickly.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: When we visit another society whose norms are different, we quickly become aware that things we do this way, they do that way
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The editor is amazed at how quickly Smith gets his stories—only minutes after they happen—but soon he's presented with a contract to sign.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: To improve her driving skills as quickly as possible.

Sentence.sentence: But I get off the phone pretty quickly when I call.

Sentence.sentence: Fortunately for him, the beach life guards were quickly on the scene to stop him from drowning.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月四级真题（第二套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: However, as Amy Edmondson of Harvard points out, organisations increasingly use "team" as a verb rather than a noun: they form teams for specific purposes and then quickly disband them.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月四级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: I am making my way through Columbia University, surrounded by students who quickly supply the verbal answer while I am still processing the question.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月四级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: In a video posted to Facebook featuring the bear, it appeared to be in relatively good health and was moving quickly.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月四级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: So he lay down and fell asleep, but the tide swept in quickly at the beach.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月四级真题（第二套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: So I have to act quickly.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月四级真题（第二套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Such a system could, if necessary, move troops quickly from one area to another.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月四级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: The club grew quickly and when it reached 180 members and the kids in the program won several state championships she decided to devote all her time to cultivating and developing it.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: They may not happen as quickly as you'd like them to, and they may turn out to be completely different from the special things you imagined at the beginnings but they will happen.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月四级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: What's indisputable is that it's growing very quickly.
